findaphoto.title: FindA.Photo
findaphoto.desc:
Snapshot of the site on 2016-03-01. Sources for FindA.Photo:
Jay Mantri / @JayMantri

and Unsplash / @unsplash.

wiki.title: Wikimedia
wiki.desc: Snapshot on 2016-03-21. Images larger than 500KB. JPEGs included only if compressed at more than 10bits per pixel.
